record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1910. Fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: C. M. Rademacher, N. C. Paine, L. H. Whiting, and E. I. Wilson; third row: N. B. Johnson (trainer), C. P. Sawyer, H. E. Whiteside, H. M. Carpenter, and W. P. Steffen (assistant coach); second row: C. G. Sauer, R. H. Young, W. L. Crawley (captain), and I. N. Davenport; first row: W. S. Kassulker, R. B. Rogers, H. C. Young, and J. A. Menaul.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on heavy, stiff, photo album paper. Attached caption.
